plot: This love story spans three lifetimes in the 1920s, 1960s and the present. Set in Singapore, it tells of the trials and tribulations of how a couple (Fann Wong and Thomas Ong) have to fight...

cast.name: Fann Wong
cast.role: Ye Qin, Li Xiangmei, Zhu Zhiyue  aka Xibao

title: Jie lian huan
